CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 6,7 Hence , an effective approach to achieve a high PCE of PSC is to design and synthesize high performance conjugated polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| high performance conjugated polymers |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "high performance conjugated polymers".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| high performance conjugated polymers |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "high performance conjugated polymers". The other phrase "a high PCE of PSC" is not a material name, but rather a property of a material (PCE stands for power conversion efficiency, and PSC stands for polymer solar cells).

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 6,7 Hence , an effective approach to achieve a high PCE of PSC is to design and synthesize high performance conjugated polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high PCE |
| high performance |

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "high PCE" and "high performance". These terms are used to describe the desired characteristics of conjugated polymers in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high PCE |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only valid "Property Value" entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property is "high PCE" (which stands for "high power conversion efficiency"). The other entity, "high performance," is too vague and does not directly refer to a specific material property.
